model_input:
Your task is to choose a more helpful MEMORY based on the below criterion.

CRITERION:
Helpfulness - The MEMORY should contain information that is both useful and relevant, enabling the Speaker B to respond in an appropriate context to the last utterance of the DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

The output format should be as follows:
Explanation: (a brief explanation)
Choice: (answer with "1", "2", or "tie")

Now choose the MEMORY that has better Helpfulness.

DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker B: About that Bluegrass show -- A friend of mine mentioned that he has a cabin he won't be using only about 20 minutes away. Do you and your wife want to stay there so you can make it? Might be a more comfortable way for your wife to camp. Let me know. 
Speaker B: That would be lovely! We can totally pay your friend to use the cabin if they would like.
Speaker A: I will let them my friend know that you are interested.  I think I might head out that way myself and camp out for the festival too.
Speaker B: Nice! Is anyone coming with you?
Speaker A: Just my doggy Drunky.  You never know,  I might meet a nice lady out there.  

MEMORY 1:
Speaker A enjoys Mexican food and drinks, and plays music for fun. Speaker A also enjoys going to bars and loves the ladies. Both Speaker A and Speaker B enjoy bluegrass music.

Speaker A owns a Subaru Legacy and mentions having a baby on the way. Speaker B is not going out drinking much due to their wife's pregnancy. Speaker B's wife is pregnant, so they are considering attending a local festival for just a day. Speaker A is not sure if they will ever settle down with a partner and have kids.

Speaker B is a mechanic who enjoys working on cars. Speaker B is feeling a bit jealous of Speaker A's ability to go out and enjoy live music while they are at home with the pregnancy. Speaker A and Speaker B discuss the logistics of attending a festival with a small baby.

MEMORY 2:
User Description:
Speaker A is a music-loving individual who enjoys playing all styles of music at home. They have a Subaru that is currently making a funny noise. Speaker A also mentioned the need for money and Mexican food for a baby. They are a nightclubber who frequents live band venues and loves interacting with women. Their car has been running smoothly, and they try to attend live events weekly. Speaker A plays the guitar daily but hasn't had much time for it recently.

Relationship Description:
Speaker A and Speaker B have a friendly and helpful relationship. Speaker B, who is a mechanic, offered to look at Speaker A's Subaru to fix the issue. Speaker B also mentioned needing money for the baby on the way and shared concerns about his wife's pregnancy. They plan to attend a local festival together and enjoy bluegrass music.

Event Description:
Events shared between Speaker A and Speaker B include planning to attend a bluegrass band concert, discussing the expenses of having a new baby, and preparing for the upcoming festival. Speaker B will take time off when the baby is born and is excited about the food and drinks at festivals. They are supportive of each other's interests and willing to help out whenever needed.

YOUR OUTPUT:
prediction:
Explanation: MEMORY 1 provides relevant context about Speaker B's wife being pregnant, their considerations for attending the festival, and possible feelings of jealousy related to Speaker A's freedom to attend live music events. This information is directly relevant to the conversation and can help Speaker B respond to or elaborate on their own situation and plans concerning the festival. MEMORY 2 also contains some related information, but it is more focused on general descriptions and less directly tied to the specifics of the conversation at hand.

Choice: 1
